items.name: Readypool Technical Services
items.description:
We are standing by to help customers with evaluating, purchasing, and using Office 365.  We specialize in helping small companies maximize their resources and make Security and Compliance a product of the process.  With past performance in NIST 800-53 and NIST 800-171, we make the process easy to adopt.  Our NIST Assist Program has proven to be the most cost-effective method available for establishing NIST Authorization to Operate and ISO Certification, and our Ready Tech Programs provide a complete roadmap to success, including “end to end” solutions ready to go.   
•	Security and Compliance as a Service
•	Enablement Desks for Curated Support
•	Mentorship and Business Development Services

items.name: Arw Systems, LLC
items.description:
Viyu offers end-to-end solutions and support for all facets of Information Technology. With a 15-year history of building on relationship driven success, delivering industry proven solutions, and providing unmatched technical support, our customers remain our primary focus.

Accredited partnerships with todays most trusted and respected manufacturers empowers our customers with the opportunity to take advantage of the best solutions that the market has to offer.  

We are the local experts that care about putting names to faces and will always strive to deliver the right solution the right way – It’s time to get to know Viyu.

items.name: 303tech
items.description: We specialize in Microsoft Office 365 integration and migration, as well as attentive desktop support, enabling you to establish an IT infrastructure that supports and enhances your business operations.

items.name: West Iowa Technology LLC
items.description:
OXEN Technology is an IT consulting firm specializing in managed services, network support, Microsoft Server, Exchange migration, Office 365 implementation, Unified Communications, and network security. For more than 32 years, we have been a leading provider of computer network services and technology solutions for Small to Mid-Sized Businesses and K-12 School Districts across the Midwest. 

From network infrastructure support to network design, and from security planning to IT consulting, we help our clients increase their performance, efficiency, and profitability in order to meet their business goals through cost-effective technology solutions.

Microsoft Partner Competencies:
- Gold Small and Midmarket Cloud Solutions
- Silver Datacenter

items.name: BFK Enterprise
items.description:
As Oklahoma’s LEADING Microsoft Partner in providing Microsoft System Center and IT architecture solutions, we are experts in System Center solutions and Enterprise Mobility services that enable our clients to better plan, build and run their critical business while cutting IT budgets and doubling efficiency.
Through our quality-focused model, we partner with our clients to ensure their goals are met and through our proven, passionate and simple solutions philosophy, we empower them to reach significantly higher efficiencies, security, and cost savings.
People, Process, Technology are at the heart of every successful business initiative and IT solution we offer. At BedriSystems, we provide solutions to some of the world’s largest corporations. We also give the same level of service and attention to small to medium-sized businesses. Our deep insights and philosophy in delivering Simple and Original solutions that we’re passionate about enable us partner with our clients to achieve huge results. Everyone wins.

items.name: Armeta Solutions, Inc.
items.description:
Solve even your most complex challenges with Armeta Analytics – a proven team of data scientists, engineers and business executives whose sole focus is to find opportunities buried in your data. 
Leverage our decades of experience taking data in any format from any system and enabling our Fortune 500 and Middle Market clients with dashboards and reports that drive revenue, maximize profitability and capture new customers.

items.name: Eide Bailly LLP
items.description:
At Eide Bailly Technology Consulting, we trust there is a better way; a better way to do business and to realize the extraordinary potential in the marketplace today. We bring our knowledge, passion, and experience to transform the way organizations are doing business, through collaboration with our clients and the leveraging of technology to drive business forward. Our strategic technology services and solutions, from relationship management and enterprise resource planning (ERP) to infrastructure support and application development, turn business challenges into opportunities for growth.

With nearly 100 years in business and 35 years in the technology industry, we deliver a diverse set of expertise to enable your business’ continued success.

Our driving force motivating each and every engagement is to understand your organization and discover the best-fit solution that will yield valuable results for your business. What makes us different – and why our clients choose to work with us – is our proactive, consultative approach to technology and our incredible team.

By and far, our people make our business, and luckily for you, our culture cultivates and attracts the industry’s leading talent.

items.name: Siroco LLC
items.description:
SIROCo, LLC is an American multinational technology solutions provider on a mission to save you time and increase your profits. As Microsoft partners, we are experienced in supporting wide range of technology solutions, including Microsoft Dynamics GP (Great Plains), NAV, AX, CRM, Office 365, Azure and SharePoint. Our well-experienced team renders state of the art implementation and service. We provide consultancy, development, customization, training, support and maintenance to partners and customers. 

Our consulting, implementation, and support services cover an array of business functions: 

Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) 
Customer Relationship Management (CRM) 
Business Intelligence (BI) 
Office Productivity (Microsoft software) 
Sales and Marketing 
Cloud Computing 
Distribution 
Manufacturing 
Supply Chain Management 
Project Management 
Service Management 
Accounting

Azure: We help businesses take advantage of Azure’s cloud-based services and flexible platform. The advantage of Azure is that you can integrate all of your cloud apps and services in one place. This includes your existing software programs, web hosting, networking, database, storage, analytics, web or mobile apps, and any propriety software we develop for you. Our IT specialists can seamlessly move your business to the cloud. Our team’s detailed onsite planning makes your transition successful. Your information is always kept safe – never lost, never compromised. We protect your data with both primary storage and disaster recovery.

Office 365 / SharePoint: Our IT specialists create an individualized plan to ensure a rapid and efficient transition to cloud based Microsoft Office 365 /SharePoint. During migration, SIROCo’s specialists ensure your data is safely and accurately moved while preserving historical information. After that, each program is automatically updated which saves you time and money. Your documents are always available to you from all devices including: desktop, tablet, mobile, or Web browser. We also protect your data and keep your organization safe with ongoing security training.  At SIROCo, our goal is to provide you with increased productivity and stronger security.

Headquartered in Dallas, SIROCo has regional offices in Atlanta and Houston delivers technology for smarter life that enables your organization to successfully achieve strategic business goals.  

SIROCo LLC – Technology for Smarter Life since 2011.

items.name: Atb Technologies LLC
items.description: Organizations are under increasing pressure to do more with less. ATB understands this and is dedicated to working with your team to understand how your business works, what areas may be enhanced, and how ATB can help your team realize their potential. Taking a consultative approach to understanding your needs, ATB helps you to reduce costs, improve efficiencies and contribute to the bottom line.

items.name: ZERO POINT CORP
items.description: With today's small business market reliant on technological systems, it can be catastrophic when they malfunction. At Zero Point, we work to ensure that this does not happen. We are a leading Silver Microsoft partner, with a Silver Small and Mid-Market Cloud Solutions Competency; ranking us as one of the highest-level solution providers in all of Colorado. Our partner ID started in 1996 with the original Microsoft Solutions Provider program.  We work with all types of businesses ranging from 1-250 users. Some examples are; service industries, legal, medical, real estate, construction, retail, manufacturing, educational and government institutions. We are also expert in working with Colorado Medical and Recreational Cannabis industries.

items.name: HD MED-TV
items.description: At CloudFirst, we deliver cloud solutions that help our customers improve business processes, increase productivity and exceed their competition. We are Microsoft Cloud Experts that specialize in creating custom solutions that align closely to the unique business goals of any sized organization.

items.name: Horizon Data Center Solutions
items.description: For over 18 years, VAZATA has been providing highly secure, stable, and scalable technology solutions. Sample services include Office365 (migrations and management), Azure Clouds, Virtual CIO, Desktop/Remote Offices and Secure Managed Clouds (FedRamp, Private, OnPrem, Hybrid).

items.name: 247 Managed Network Solutions, Inc
items.description: We focus on smaller business customers and provide top quality planning, install and management for business networks, servers and workstations. We have the ability to support end users and custom application development.

items.name: Concergent IT, A Division of UV&S
items.description: Concergent IT, a Division of Underground Vaults & Storage, is a full-service data center and technology-consulting firm committed to long lasting client relationships through innovative, timely service.

items.name: The Miller Group
items.description: Our IT services offering covers the typical tasks, duties and responsibilities performed by an in-house IT department along with much more. From the desktops your employees use every day, to the servers and other infrastructure components that power your business and protect your valuable data, The Miller Group offers service plans guaranteed to fit both your requirements and your budget. From network monitoring to data backup, our service model is designed to be hassle-free.

items.name: ETC Computerland - Default Directory
items.description:
ETC ComputerLand (formerly known as ETC Computer Solutions) began operations in 1997, serving various roles for companies and individuals in Quincy , Illinois. In February of 2007, ETC purchased ComputerLand of Quincy. 

ETC ComputerLand provides services for your entire IT environment, from enterprise to small business. Everything from managed IT services to server deployment and virtualization projects. 

We have extensive experience with enterprise networking, Cloud and Hybrid-Cloud, and IT security services. We partner with and offer solutions from Cisco, HP, Microsoft (including Azure), VMware, and Symantec. We specialize in Storage, Virtualization, and all things Cloud. We serve customers in the Quincy, IL and Hannibal, MO surrounding areas.

ETC ComputerLand can streamline your Azure cloud deployment as well as support your existing and future Office 365 deployments. Let us do the heavy lifting.

items.name: Aftermarket Technologies, Inc.
items.description:
Alliance Technology Partners specializes in Cyber Secure Cloud Management.  We help small and mid-sized organizations migrate to a Cyber Secure Cloud to optimize productivity and scale efficiently.  The Armada Cloud is built on the Microsoft Azure platform and is secure and is green friendly, as we optimize cloud usage to save our clients money and reduce wasted energy resources.   

Alliance also provides immediate phone and chat support for Office 365 and Azure to help our clients maximize employee productivity.

items.name: Hbr Computer Stores Inc
items.description: HBR Technologies is a Microsoft Cloud & Office 365 certified Managed IT Service Provider located in Carrollton, TX. We provide IT services for businesses located in Carrollton, Addison, Farmers Branch, Plano, Frisco, Lewisville, Richardson, and other cities in the Dallas area. We were established in 1984 and are still under the original company management. We provide computer support, network services, information technology security and technology consulting services to small and medium sized businesses and schools. The proactive managed computer services provided to our clients allow them to focus on running their business not on their computers. If you need a professional Computer Support organization that can provide you with technology consulting services, system implementation, onsite computer support, or managed IT services, call us at 972-380-8085.

items.name: THE FULCRUM GROUP INC
items.description:
What do we have to offer?
Our SPOT Managed IT Services computer tech support is fixed fee pricing, allowing you to get strategic IT support from our team of experts for a fraction of the cost of employing one full-time IT professional. Avoid unnecessary costly burdens for your DFW business. With The Fulcrum Group as your trusted partner in IT you can:

Increase uptime and reduce time to resolve issues – keep IT working for you.
Delegate management of your IT vendors to us – so you can focus on running your business.
Enjoy service beyond tech support – with Quarterly Business Reviews we’ll align your IT with your business goals.
Relax – The Fulcrum Group takes on your IT risk.
Browse our wide array of services – from Cloud Service offerings, to IT Network Infrastructure solutions and VoIP (Voice over IP) PBX solutions, we provide a one-stop-shop for all of your IT and telecommunications needs.
Utilize our Texas Certified HUB status. We are now better equipped to help you in your state procurement of the most advanced technology equipment and services.
